reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater perfect for the holiday season and appreciate its appearance, with one noting it looks like boutique quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad!?
items.body: I'm surprised by some of the negative reviews... This sweater is better quality than most of what you see on Amazon and big box stores. I got it in black and the colors are as shown. The & symbol is gold, not brown. It's not super thick, but definitely not thin or see through. The letters are sparkly and look like tinsel, which is festive and fun! I'm not at all worried about machine washing it on delicate and drying it on a rack. Is it the softest, most luxurious sweater in the world? No. But for the price it's fine! It's really cute in person. If you're on the fence, don't be scared off by the naysayers. Read more
items.author: MrsK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly very cute!
items.body: I was very surprised by this sweater because I wasn’t expecting to get exactly what was pictured, but I did! This sweater is thick, warm, and pretty soft. The quality is better than expected and the lettering is bright. The fit is true to size. Wound up loving this water! Read more
items.author: Brooke Ford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for Christmas
items.body: This Christmas sweater is nice and soft, not super soft, but soft enough. It runs slightly large, I got the small, I would have gone down to extra small, but that’s not an option. The words are bright and colorful, I got black and white, and I’m happy with them both Read more
items.author: Carol Whincup

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Average Quality Christmas Sweater
items.body: This sweater is what I expected, Cute but not super soft or high quality. For the few times I will wear it before Christmas it is a good purchase. Very cute and the fit is pretty good. I got the XL, I am 208 lbs 5'6", Size 12/14 and the fit was relaxed and not tight at all, if You want a more fitted look I would size down.. for a traditional sweater fit order your TS. The thickness is medium, it not thin but you can see thru the white a little and I will wear a tank underneath. Length is good, it's not a bum covering sweater but it hits at the right spot for jeans or a dress. It was a good value for the Price Point. Read more
items.author: aberfitchgr534

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super happy with this
items.body: This sweater turned out to be a great surprise for myself. I thought it would be cheap and itchy -- it's not thick, you need a top underneath it, but it's really cute and comfy. The bottom falls at just the right place and it the fit is perfect. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality.
items.body: Not great quality. But still cute. Sweater was not very soft and the quality of the letters were poor. But I only wear it to work so I kept it. Read more
items.author: Amanda Grimes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars touch of glam
items.body: great holiday sweater. its colorful, cute and comfy. What more can you ask for!? TTS Read more
items.author: Dawn White

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
items.body: Beautiful sweater, the colors are vibrant. Fabric is soft & very well made. Read more
items.author: Pat G.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z-white Boo, A-lightpink Heart01, Y-black, A-lightpink Heart02, B-irish, Y-black Bright, A-vdblack02, B-green Lucky02, Z-black Boo, A-rose White Heart, Y-bright White, B-green Love02, A-black Xoxo, A-red Xo. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
